Package mygame.game

Class TicTacToeTUI

java.lang.Object
mygame.game.TicTacToe
mygame.game.TicTacToeTUI
public final class TicTacToeTUI extends TicTacToe
A TicTacToe game with a TUI.

Extends TicTacToe to provide methods for prompting the user for their move and and printing the game board.

  • Constructor Details

    • TicTacToeTUI

      public TicTacToeTUI(String... playerIDs)
      Creates a TicTacToe game with a TUI interface.

      The symbols (O and X) are assigned randomly each game, but our user will always be green and the opponent red.

      Parameters:
      playerIDs - the IDs of the players, the first of which must be that of the user

  • Method Details

    • prompt

      public int prompt()
      Prompts the user to make their move by using arrow keys to navigate and Enter to select.

      This blocks the current thread until the user pressed Enter.*

      Returns:
      the ordinal of the chosen slot

    • update

      public void update(Integer move)
      Description copied from class: TicTacToe
      Updates the game state with a new move.
      Overrides:
      update in class TicTacToe
      Parameters:
      move - the move to make, represented as a number in range [0, 225)
